thread.title: New Video Shows How Mexican Journalist Casually Pulled Off Tom Brady Super Bowl Jersey Heist
thread.title_full: New Video Shows How Mexican Journalist Casually Pulled Off Tom Brady Super Bowl Jersey Heist

author: Jorge Alonso
title: New Video Shows How Mexican Journalist Casually Pulled Off Tom Brady Super Bowl Jersey Heist
text:
Yesterday, we learned that Mexican journalist Mauricio Ortega of La Prensa was responsible for stealing Tom Brady’s jersey and attempting to secretly sell it for $75k .
@CNN The suspect is director of @laprensaoem Mauricio Ortega. pic.twitter.com/9UqQ6SsTVi 
— WILDHEART (@whcantbebroken) March 20, 2017 

Thanks to Jay Glazer and FS1 we now have additional video footage on how Ortega pulled the whole thing off and it’s quite amazing how casually Ortega pulled the whole thing off. 
EXCLUSIVE: Minute-by-minute look at how the alleged culprit in Tom Brady's jersey theft spent his night at the Super Bowl
via @JayGlazer pic.twitter.com/5d5aXlqQvz 
— Herd w/Colin Cowherd (@TheHerd) March 21, 2017 

That dude was fucking bold.
